summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear to be implemented via a structured cooking response formatter with a cookie-baking fallback template, plus new snippet cleanup/normalization utilities and improved partial-failure handling for cooking queries. However, the diff summary also introduces multiple unrelated product features (guest mode, speech I/O, UI restyling, photo upload, etc.) that were not requested in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Guest mode support and auth-gated history/export UX changes
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest focuses only on improving cooking answers/formatting and includes constraints about not changing auth behavior.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (App.tsx: guest mode support; ConversationSidebar: login prompt for history/export)
project_state.json (overall app direction notes unrelated to cooking formatting)

hallucinated_features.description: Speech recognition and speech synthesis (voice input/output) features
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest is specifically about cooking answer structure and snippet cleanup, and explicitly lists non-goals around new AI/real-time features (though speech isn't mentioned, it's still out of scope).

hallucinated_features.description: Photo upload and inline photo rendering in chat UI
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; outside cooking-answer formatting scope.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (ConversationThread.tsx: inline photo rendering; ChatComposer.tsx: photo upload with previews; components/chat/types.ts: PhotoAttachment)

hallucinated_features.description: Major UI theming changes (OKLCH color system, font stack, shadows) and updated empty state/capabilities dialog content
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest does not mention visual redesign.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (index.css color system; tailwind.config.js font stack; ChatEmptyState.tsx updated prompts; CapabilitiesDialog.tsx updated dialog)
